comments.message:
Hi everyone, thank you for your feedback and support for our One Piece collectibles. The demand we have received for the collectibles has exceeded the projections we made based on market research. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused and moving forward, we will limit purchases of popular collectibles so that they can be enjoyed by as many customers and fans as possible. 

We would also like to take this opportunity to remind our customers to exercise due care when sharing their personal contact details online and be cautious about making arrangements with strangers. We really appreciate your patience with us and we will use your feedback and work to improve your experience during future promotions. Thank you.
So squeezy compare to picture
Jurong point branch don't sell me during breakfast, they told me only starts at 11am. But I bought the 1st set during my breakfast. Isn't breakfast a extra value meal too?? So disappointed.
Get all the collectible but without thousand sunny ship...feel like missing a part of them...so sad...
100 ships per store and you're letting per person buy 3 to 4 ship! What were you thinking?!

Guys! You all need to chill. The chibi version toys are quite cute. But the Sunny Go is just a paper ship made from nicely printed paper, and stored in a nicely printed Primary School Art Folio. It's prolly limited cos Mc has limited of these which were given out in Japan FREE! If you really desire a SunnyGo, there are nicer ones out there readily available in toy stores.  No need for all the hate and cussing man. No one's gonna pay 50 or 70 bucks for Paper Ships on Carousell.

Dear Mac, due to a lot of unhappiness and disappointment that a lot of people are facing for not getting the ship. Can you seriously consider to let people just order the ship? It's so unfair for those people like me that really want to collect but unable to get one. Hope to get a satisfactory reply from u asap!
Happy collecting paper sunny ship!

How about releasing a PDF file and we print ourselves? And also to make scalpers eat their own paper boats. 
WIN-WIN!
Hey pple go to the above website download and make your own paper model of the ship

Hmmmm...100per store =only for 10 ppl buy only ...behind ppl no need buy liao ..unfair...
Harbourfront center, yeah
Limited Edition One Piece Ship... Only one piece in Singapore...
Its just a paper ship. I rather you all go Toys r us or departmental store get the real model. Dont waste your money on overpriced PAPER SHIP!
at bukit merah mac, someone bought 25 ships at one go! Worse than what you had seen azril yusof
Yeah....Sing d Happy Song....^^
i can't believe people are allowed to buy multiple ships when there is only 100 per outlet =__=

Dear McDonald's SG, my friend and I came down early to the Punggol CC outlet to queue for the One Piece ship as there are only 100 pieces per outlet as stated. However there is no proper queue system or numbering system! The queues are incredibly messy and there are people buying 5+ ships at one go. I recall for the Hello Kitty toys sale there was a proper queue for it as well as a ticketing system where only 1 toy per person in the queue was allowed. Why was this not done here? Also when I asked your staff if it was possible to buy a breakfast meal and get the toy, she replied me very rudely with 'then you can come back on sat/sun' and summarily ignored me. Incredibly poor customer service! Very unsatisfactorily handled. Please account for the poor handling of this!
Dear Mcdonald,  can you please release more Thousand Sunny paper ship?? Plsss. I DO NOT WANT TO LET THOSE RESELLERS TO EARN MY MONEY! ! NO WAY!

This is utterly outrageous. 1 person buying 10 of the limited edition toy and left the rest of us behind the queue with no hope of getting one. They should limit 1 person per limited edition toy so everyone will have their chance of getting it.

0.post_text:
Complete your McDonald’s One Piece Collectibles set this week as we launch the Nami, Usopp and Luffy Collectibles today!  
 
The limited edition build-it-yourself paper model of the iconic Thousand Sunny Ship is also in restaurants now! (not available at KK Hospital, Tampines Kiosk, Shaw Lido or via McDelivery®.) There are only 100 pieces for sale per restaurant, so grab them while you can! Each piece is available at $3.95 with purchase of an Extra Value Meal*.
 
*One Piece collectibles are available with the purchase of an Extra Value Meal™ only at McDonald’s® stores (excluding KK Hospital, Tampines Kiosk and Shaw Lido) or via the McDelivery® hotline (6777 3777). One Piece collectibles are not available via McDelivery® Online and Mobile App ordering.

5.post_text:
Get your tastebuds ready!

Experience the unbeatable flavour of savoury turkey bacon and melty cheese, generously drizzled with BBQ chipotle sauce, served with a juicy beef patty. Silvered onions, lettuce and tomato add extra taste to this tantalizing combo – sandwiched between fluffy sesame buns for a delicious, certified superstar!

To complete your epic meal, turn up the flavour with Cheese Shaker Fries and a Coke Float!

These promotional items are now available in restaurants, while stocks last.

This Sunday, we’re hosting breakfast at Ang Mo Kio Park McDonald’s for 20 families! 

It’ll be a morning of fun family time as we provide 20 families with breakfast on us, on top of a variety of fun activities! 

For the chance to be one of the 20 families to join us at this event, tune in to KISS 92FM and watch out for our on-air contest! 

Each family will receive a picnic mat, picnic basket, and complimentary meals for the whole family – 2 American Breakfast Platter Extra Value Meals™ and 2 Hotcakes (2pc) Happy Meals. 

Good luck!

19.post_text:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bmik0dP8pLg&list=UU8az0OO4wXXu2k0ifJjxxBg

If you are a One Piece fan, you’re in for a treat! This week, we launched the Zoro and Robin One Piece collectibles, and seven more designs will be launched in the weeks to come! 

One Piece collectibles are available with the purchase of an Extra Value Meal™ only at McDonald’s® stores (excluding KK Hospital, Tampines Kiosk and Shaw Lido) and the McDelivery® hotline, 6777 3777. One Piece collectibles are not available via McDelivery® Online and Mobile App ordering.

We are also on the lookout for Singapore’s Biggest One Piece Fans, and will be hosting a One Piece Fan Appreciation Party on 28 November. For a chance to win an invitation to this event, simply:
1. Share your pictures of the McDonald’s One Piece collectibles on Instagram with #McdSGOnePiece
2. And then, send us a private message with your full name, Instagram username, contact number and email address*

Pictures can also include images of your One Piece memorabilia collection and your One Piece cosplay images.

30 lucky customers with the best pictures will each receive an invitation to the exclusive One Piece Fan Appreciation party! 

Contest ends on 21 November, and winners will be contacted by 25 November. 

This contest is opened to those aged 13 and above.

Good luck! 

*Information requested will be used to send the winners invitations to the One Piece Fan Appreciation Party

For contest terms and conditions, please visit https://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/one-piece/One_Piece_Instagram_Contest_TC.pdf

21.post_text:
One Day to McHappy Day!  

This year, we will be hosting a #forRMHC Party and an island-wide street sale in support of the Ronald McDonald House Charities® Singapore. 

Come on down to Tampines Mall, Event Space @ Level 4 from 1pm-5pm tomorrow as we host an afternoon of fun and games for the whole family - all for a good cause! 

Volunteers from McDonald’s and friends of RMHC® Singapore will also be hitting the streets tomorrow, selling the red and white kids’ socks to raise funds for RMHC® Singapore.  

Are you as excited as we are? #forRMHC #RMHCSG

23.post_text:
Have a taste of France this festive season with our delicious Macarons! The light-as-a-feather classic French treats are filled with tasty ganache that will simply melt in your mouth. 

The Macarons are available with Vanilla, Raspberry or Pistachio ganache and are available a la carte from $2.30 per piece or served together with a Small Cappuccino from $4.20.  

Available now in all McCafé outlets for a limited time, while stocks last.

comments.message:
Last week i went to CCK CC that outlet, i brought Breakfast Deluxe & upgrade to Ice Milo, staff who served me is a Floor Manager charged me $0.40.
When i told her is foc upgrade (because when i bought at Fajar outlet is FOC upgrade), she told me only applicable to American BreakFast & Insisted to charge me $0.40 for the change of drinks to Ice Milo.
I  was taken aback but i did not argue with her & pay the additional charge.
I guessed information was not disseminated down properly.
I every weekend will bring my boys to hv Breakfast Deluxe, that is why i know the cost.

+1 bacon = american? 
so + bubble tea = taiwanese... + ang moh tea then english..... ???
With the price, I'd rather eat at Coffee Bean or Swensen's for their breakfast.

Tried it this morning, the scrambled egg has a slice of melted cheese + fried onions on it + 1 pc of bacon. The egg is still quite tasteless, I had to put salt and pepper. Seriously overhyped. Nothing impressive really. I've tasted better real american breakfast (freeflow with scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage) at hotels in US.

Hello 'american breakfast', meet the ultimate breakfast from CBTL. It costs a couple more bucks but the quality is way better, the quantity is way more, & the freshness, is something you guys at macs cant beat.
Erm in what way is this different from the big breakfast and considered 'American'? The eggs, sausage patty, muffins and all are the same. Only difference was the bacon?
The only difference is a pathetic slice of bacon.
wats d diff!  still big bf wat??
Rose apparently Iced Milos are a thing now? :O
American = Big breakfast + $1 bacon lol
The Milo is tasteless 😣
Prasath Letch OMG they heard my prayers 😳 they created what I wanted!!
I hate McDonald's and the food is horrible and hope everyone believe me, so my queueing time is much shorter.
蔡依珈宇星嘉

All the while they doesn't emphasize the big breakfast from America , only now added a small slide of bacon then is a new style call " American breakfast" business strategy make difference due to change if packaging, haha😄
Put bacon become American ..

of course the real american breakfast tastes better in US! and in hotels, no less! what do you expect from McDonalds Singapore? If the local McDonalds can do up hotel-standard breakfasts, then the cooks in the McDonalds outlet wouldn't be working there anymore.
Aah... Milo ♥♥♥ Hery Ng Valentine Lim
miss the original one,, in my hometown Texas XD
Clearing milo stock..
Jescinda Teo we're going soon
wonder what kind of bacon is that if mac is halal?

Jamie Mini Ivan Wong John Chiam

Should we one of the day?
Nick Amego Aaron King your American breakfast

24.post_text:
Come for the platter, stay for the chatter. Start your day with our new American Breakfast Platter!
 
From now till 31 December, you can opt for a free upgrade to Iced Milo (S) with every purchase of a Breakfast Platter Extra Value Meal.
 
The free upgrade is available for American Breakfast Platter, Big Breakfast, Breakfast Deluxe, Breakfast Supreme, Hotcakes, and Hotcakes with Sausage Extra Value Meals. Not available via McDelivery, or with other Breakfast Extra Value Meals.  
 
The American Breakfast Platter is available at all restaurants, for a limited time only.
